targetBranches.description: Target branch UUIDs. Empty array = all branches in the tenant.

targetRoles.description: Target roles (e.g. "student", "staff", "parent"). Empty array = all roles.

content.example: Details about the upcoming annual day event.

attachments.description: Attachment file paths stored in tenant folder

targetBranches.description: Target branch UUIDs. Empty array = all branches in the tenant.

targetRoles.description: Target roles (e.g. "student", "staff", "parent"). Empty array = all roles.

content.example: Details about the upcoming annual day event.

attachments.description: Attachment file paths stored in tenant folder

createUserAccount.description: When true and email is provided, a User account with role "parent" will be auto-created for this guardian.

password.description: Password for the parent user account (required when createUserAccount is true)

filePath.description: S3 file path (must start with tenant_id/materials/)

fileSize.description: File size in bytes for quota tracking

filePath.description: S3 file path (must start with tenant_id/materials/)

userId.description: User ID (OneToOne). Provide either userId OR (email + password + firstName + lastName) to auto-create a user account.

email.description: Email for auto-creating a user account (required if userId is not provided)

password.description: Password for the new user account (required if userId is not provided)

firstName.description: First name for the new user account (required if userId is not provided)

lastName.description: Last name for the new user account (required if userId is not provided)

userRole.description: Role for the auto-created user (teacher=4, staff=5, accountant=6)

roles.description: Branch-specific roles for initial branch assignment

userId.description: User ID (OneToOne). Provide either userId OR (email + password + firstName + lastName) to auto-create a user account.

email.description: Email for auto-creating a user account (required if userId is not provided)

password.description: Password for the new user account (required if userId is not provided)

firstName.description: First name for the new user account (required if userId is not provided)

lastName.description: Last name for the new user account (required if userId is not provided)

userRole.description: Role for the auto-created user (teacher=4, staff=5, accountant=6)

roles.description: Branch-specific roles for initial branch assignment

branchId.description: Filter by branch. Omit to process all branches.

targetBranches.description: Target branch UUIDs. Empty array means all branches in tenant.

targetRoles.description: Target roles (e.g. student, staff, parent). Empty array means all roles.

content.example: Details about the upcoming annual day event.

attachments.description: Attachment file paths stored in tenant folder
